'''{{class|Actor}}'''
native void LinkToWorld(LinkContext ctx = null)
== Usage == Links the Actor back into the sector it's currently in and the block map if it doesn't have the flags preventing it from doing so. This function is largely only used after an Actor has been unlinked or if it was never linked to begin with.
=== Parameters === *{{c|LinkContext '''ctx'''}} :A pointer to the {{struct|LinkContext}} struct that contains sector and rendering sector information about the current level. This struct is normally obtained when calling [[UnlinkFromWorld]] fist. :If {{c|null}} (default), generates a new context for the Actor.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
